headline: Spain Data Center Colocation Market - Supply & Demand Analysis Report 2025-2030 | Utilized White Floor Area, IT Power Capacity, and Racks
summary: Spain's data center colocation market is projected to experience robust growth with a CAGR of 31.86% from 2024 to 2030, driven by increased investments from existing and new companies. As of December 2024, Spain boasts 63 active colocation centers, with Madrid as the key expansion hub, hosting over 30 facilities. Prominent operators like Merlin Properties, Digital Realty, and Equinix dominate the scene, while new entrants continue to shape the market. The report provides comprehensive insights,

headline: Latin America Data Center Colocation Market Industry Outlook & Forecast Report 2025-2030 | AI, 5G, and Edge Computing Drive 25.7% CAGR in Latin America Data Center Colocation Market to 2030
summary: The Latin America data center colocation market is set to expand significantly, with an anticipated CAGR of 25.69% from 2024 to 2030. Key factors driving this growth include the rollout of 5G networks across the region, promoting demand for edge computing facilities that support real-time applications and AI adoption.
